channel.title: Cant join any server
channel.description:
Well its like this.
At first when i started playing moparscape everything went well.
But now i cant join any freakin server.
I used both www.moparisthebest.com/index and www.client.silabsoft.org/client
I keep trying, i have tried at least 100 times but its always the same answer.
After i log in it says 'Loading... Please wait.'
I can wait 1h but its still the same thing.
[u]WHY?![/u]
:mad: :mad:

item.title: Cant join any server
item.dc:creator: @holygod holygod
item.description:
@holygod wrote:

If i knew howto…

Don’t know their website now that i cant log on anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant join any server
item.dc:creator: @sabotage sabotage
item.description:
@sabotage wrote:

Find a server you like, and download their client.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant join any server
item.dc:creator: @xmatt931x xmatt931x
item.description:
@xmatt931x wrote:

[quote=“holygod, post:3, topic:235065”][quote author=trytohaxme link=topic=309986.msg2475999#msg2475999 date=1223251706]
Try a different server?
Look in the moparscape status list and pick a server
put your name and pass and the server ip
[/quote]

Yeah, and then i’ll play like 30-60 minutes till it laggs and i cant log on anymore…

It would be fun to train a character to high lvl instead of doing the same freakin thing all over.[/quote]

that is because most servers arent 24/7 and go on and off throughout the day. you need to find a 24/7 server even though almost all say they are “24/7” almost all arent

Read full topic
